PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02912018-03-12,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
PrecisApproval of the Minister’s decision to authorize JEAN BÉDARD, Q.C., of Ottawa, Ontario, to act as Chairperson of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal for a period of four months, effective March 2, 2018, or until a Chairperson is appointed, whichever is earlier.
AttachmentsAttachment
